en.av_c1: When you write a recursive method that traverses a binary tree, you should avoid the following common mistakes
en.av_c2: Do not forget to check if the root is null
en.av_c3: Do not check if the children are null when your solution doesn't require that you explicitly do that
en.av_c4: Do not access the children's values when your solution doesn't require that you explicitly do that
